sect1.title: Authentication client
sect1.para: The configuration file must be in the JSON format. Verify that both autoyast2 and autoyast2-installation are installed. Use the Autoinstallation Configuration module in YaST to generate a valid JSON configuration file. Launch YaST and switch to the Miscellaneous Autoinstallation Configuration . Choose Network Services User Logon Management , click Edit, and configure the available settings. Click OK when done. To save the generated configuration file, use File Save .

tip.title: Using ldaps://
tip.para: To use LDAP with native SSL (rather than TLS), add the ldaps resource.
